column5: **DUE TO THE RECENT TORNADOES IN CANTON TEXAS WE ARE OFFERING OUR FACILITIES AS A SOURCE OF TEMPORARY HOUSING TO THOSE WHO HAVE BEEN DISPLACED**  The Getaway is also a perfect destination for families, groups, scrapbookers, and small weddings. 5 comfortable bedrooms - up to 16 guests. A second facility is also available. Towels and linens are included. Concierge Service and a Massage Therapist will be onsite at most times.
